name: NSDraggingInfo
desc: A set of methods that supply information about a dragging session.

items.name: var draggingPasteboard: NSPasteboard
items.desc: Returns the pasteboard object that holds the data being dragged.

items.name: var draggingSequenceNumber: Int
items.desc: Returns a number that uniquely identifies the dragging session.

items.name: var draggingSource: Any?
items.desc: Returns the source, or owner, of the dragged data.

items.name: var draggingSourceOperationMask: NSDragOperation
items.desc: Information about the dragging operation and the data it contains.

items.name: var draggingLocation: NSPoint
items.desc: Returns the current location of the mouse pointer in the base coordinate system of the destination object’s window.

items.name: var draggingDestinationWindow: NSWindow?
items.desc: Returns the destination window for the dragging operation.

items.name: var numberOfValidItemsForDrop: Int
items.desc: Specifies the number of valid items for a drop operation.

items.name: var draggedImageLocation: NSPoint
items.desc: Returns the current location of the dragged image’s origin.

items.name: func slideDraggedImage(to: NSPoint)
items.desc: Slides the image to a specified location.

items.name: var animatesToDestination: Bool
items.desc: Returns whether the dragging formation animates while the drag is over this destination.

items.name: var draggingFormation: NSDraggingFormation
items.desc: Returns the dragging formation while the drag is over this destination.

items.name: func enumerateDraggingItems(options: NSDraggingItemEnumerationOptions, for: NSView?, classes: [AnyClass], searchOptions: [NSPasteboard.ReadingOptionKey : Any], using: (NSDraggingItem, Int, UnsafeMutablePointer<ObjCBool>) -> Void)
var springLoadingHighlight: NSSpringLoadingHighlight
items.desc: Highlighting style to be displayed by your app’s user interface during a spring-loading operation.

items.name: func resetSpringLoading()
items.desc: Resets a spring-loading operation to its initial state.

items.name: struct NSDragOperation
items.desc: These constants are used by draggingSourceOperationMask.

items.name: struct NSDraggingItemEnumerationOptions
items.desc: These constants specify the enumerateDraggingItems(options:for:classes:searchOptions:using:) options for the options parameter.

items.name: enum NSSpringLoadingHighlight
items.desc: These constants indicate a highlighting style to be displayed by your app’s user interface during a spring-loading operation. One of these constant values will be provided by the springLoadingHighlight method.

items.name: enum NSDraggingFormation
items.desc: These constants control the visual format of multiple items being dragged.

items.name: enum NSDraggingContext
items.desc: These parameters specify whether a drag terminates within or outside the application.
